definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The grounding wires can be fixed on case body and case door. The connecting parts can be detached.
sentences.chinese: 箱体和箱门上都可安装接地线，连接件可以卸下。

sentences.english: A geodesic dome is a round building made of many straight-sided pieces.
sentences.chinese: 测地线拱顶是一个全面建设的许多直幅片面。

sentences.english: Because arc length of trajectory is regarded as the variant in geodesics based method, it .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于测地线的机器人轨迹规划方法。

sentences.english: The return wire in an audio circuit is called ground.
sentences.chinese: 音响电路中负责送回信号的线叫做地线。

sentences.english: Grounding tie-in shall be provided for compressor units.
sentences.chinese: 压缩机橇块上应提供接地线接头。

sentences.english: It is shown that the proper acceleration of null geodesic with conjugate points approaches infinity.
sentences.chinese: 具有共轭点的类光测地线的固有加速度趋于无穷大。

sentences.english: The use of grounding wires in the Heilongjiang electric power system is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黑龙江省电力系统接地线使用的状况。

sentences.english: Discussion is based on the fact that the shortest arc on surface is geodesic.
sentences.chinese: 应用“曲面上最短弧为测地线”的事实进行了讨论。

sentences.english: The terminal connection was assembled with 3 pins with earth wire, which ensures the safety.
sentences.chinese: 堵头采用带地线三针插座，确保用户使用安全。

sentences.english: Strictly prohibited ground connected to the zero line or water pipe .
sentences.chinese: 严禁将地线接在零线或自来水管上。

sentences.english: The green and yellow wire is the earth.
sentences.chinese: 那条黄绿两色的线是地线。

sentences.english: Check up wether the rewinder. s four feet is stable and the body of it is connected with ground electrode.
sentences.chinese: 检查复卷机四脚安装是否平稳，机体有无接地线。

sentences.english: Install a ground cable on the triplex pump motor.
sentences.chinese: 给三抽缸泵马达安装接地线。

sentences.english: In 1728 Euler gave differential equations for geodesics on surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 1728年，奥伊勒绘出了曲面上测地线的微方程。

sentences.english: Note that the signal ground line should also be connected in the system.
sentences.chinese: 当然，系统的信号接地线也应该连接。

sentences.english: We people on the Eath are already bad enough, do we have to make it more bad?
sentences.chinese: 我们人已经够坏的地线，我们是否要使它更坏？

definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
